author: TONY TRAN

review: Excellent!  My kids love it and my wife and I enjoy the movies!  We will order another FireTV box when we can afford it, the kids love the games they can play on it, hint to parents, get the game controller for the games, excellent for anybody wanting to play the games offered.  Amazon Prime is also well worth the money, lots of kid shows too.Edit:We home school and the FireTV is an excellent addition to our tools of education for our kids.  Plus I would like to add how powerful the box is.... for $100 it rivals much more expensive boxes.  Lots of bang for the buck.Had it for about a month..... we don't regret the decision to buy it.
author: Rebecca Lahr

review: Not enough stars to give this product.  Its so nice to be able to watch so many movies and other choices.  Love that there is games too.  Highly recommend.  Was so simple to set up and no problems.
author: Heidi

review: The device is fantastic!  I have more content available that I'll never outlive, YAY!!  Recently, I found that I must have ANDROID-based devices to really get the most out of the unit.  It's inferred in Amazon's advertisement but it's more like a subliminal message.  Does that make me buy another device?  NO!  I'm flush with devices and remotes.  What I really want to know is why is there a USB port and NO documentation on how to use the port.  I hate that, they don't even give it in technical details.  Amazon implies it's all so simple, so anyone have a good answer?  I did find you can hack the device and port in a hard drive with movies, videos, etc. but I'd rather not.
author: TDaddy
